Commissioner Marcos A. Arroyo
=============================

![](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Arroyo.jpg)

Commissioner Marcos A. Arroyo
-----------------------------

**Commissioner Marcos A. Arroyo is the Director of Public Works**

#### Commissioner

* Marcos A. Arroyo
* 201-295-5200
